lexUnit.name: inject.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: introduce a liquid, especially a drug, into the body with a syringe

sentence.text: Drug users who continue to inject drugs can protect themselves by never sharing equipment ( e.g. needles , syringes or spoons ) .
New drugs , such as gancyclovir , injected into a vein , can be effective but the problem often recurs .
A man who suffers excruciating back pain claims his life has been ruined by a drug injected into his spine .
A heroin addict probably injects two or three times a day , but cocaine is often injected at regular 15-minute intervals until the drugs and the money have run out .

The spread of HIV infection through the medium of shared injection equipment would therefore appear to be less likely among Wirral users compared to other major cities in the UK where heroin users mostly inject their drugs .
Finally , up to one in five known heroin users had been injecting the drug during 1985-6 , a worrying increase on the previous year .
I 'll give the girl quarter of a grain of morphia dissolved in water and inject it to calm her down .
` If you share a needle when you inject drugs , the chances of the needle being infected are 1-in-eight .
The survey revealed that 100,000 people had injected drugs in the past five years , with more than half sharing needles .
Women who inject drugs and who share needles and syringes are at risk of contracting HIV .
The addicts thought they were injecting a synthetic heroin , instead they had given themselves a permanent Parkinson-like condition .
Some of these casual injectors do not inject street heroin because of the impurities that it might contain and limit their injecting to other opioids generally stolen from chemist shops .
Some of the males were injected with morphine for a few days and some were given other drugs .
As the big vessel came up tense and turgid I thrust in the needle and injected the adrenalin .
I started off by smoking it and then , when I injected it , I found I got more of a hit , y'know what I mean .
Thirty µg of peptide conjugate were then injected intravenously .
When injected with heparin there was a normal fertilization-induced calcium transient , whereas the response to either GTP- γ S or InsP 3 was inhibited .
I mean if you 're into the hit , you 've got to inject then , otherwise you 're just using it to keep the turkey away .
